title: Ayushmann Khurrana, Tahira Kashyap contribute to Maharashtra CM's Relief Fund amid COVID-19 pandemic
description: Ayushmann shared a note on his Instagram account thanking each and every person who has constantly inspired the couple to contribute more towards helping people ravaged by the health crisis.

title: COVID-19: Maharashtra floats global tender for procuring Remdesivir, oxygen amid shortage
description: Maharashtra Health Minister Rajesh Tope on Tuesday informed that the state government has floated a global tender to procure Remdesivir (a drug used in treating coronavirus patients) and oxygen amid an acute shortage in the state.

title: If we don’t get (Covid-19) vaccines, how will we start vaccination from May 1, says Maharashtra minister Rajesh Tope
description: Maharashtra has over 5 crore people in the age group of 18-44 years and, for their two-dose vaccine and taking wastage into account, 12 crore doses will be needed.

title: Maharashtra's Poor COVID Experience Is Reflection of Half a Century of Identity Politics
description: When ethnicity or religion is the touchstone of politics, a society loses its capacity to think clearly about its future  – let alone make provision for a secure one.

title: Covid-19: Maharashtra inoculates more than half million people in a day
description: Amid a sharp rise in the number of Covid-19 cases and deaths in Maharashtra, the state on Monday vaccinated more than half million people in a single day, informed the state health department

title: Social group ensures dignified farewell to COVID-19 victims in Maharashtra
description: The organisation comprises about 40 members, including some auto-rickshaw drivers and mobile technicians, in the age group of 22 to 64 years.

title: COVID-19: With 5,34,372 people vaccinated in Maharashtra on April 26, tally crosses 1.49 cr

title: Bodies of 22 COVID-19 victims stuffed in one ambulance in Maharashtra
description: An official said the local medical infrastructure is “stressed” as critical patients from nearby districts are also brought to Ambajogai.

title: Rising debt, no widow pension: COVID-19 crisis brings Maharashtra's vulnerable women farmers to the brink-India News , Firstpost
description: A survey of 940 single women farmers has exposed their increased vulnerability during the COVID-19 pandemic and the lockdown in Maharashtra.

title: Maharashtra sees sharp drop in daily COVID-19 cases
description: Number of new cases in Maharashtra and Mumbai are dropping day by day. Experts says, number of people infected from one patient is also decreasing day by day. On the other hand, the state is increasing vaccination.

description: BJP MLA from Kalyan (Eest) Ganpat Gaikwad has decided to utilise the money he had saved for his son's marriage to provide Covid-19 vaccine to the peop

title: Maharashtra: Over 5 lakh get Covid-19 jabs in a day, highest so far

title: Maharashtra sees dip in Covid cases with fewer tests, records 48,700 infections
description: The Covid-19 caseload in the state now stands at 4,343,727, while the death toll increased to 65, 284 after more than 500 fatalities in the last 24 hours, the bulletin also showed.

title: Maharashtra COVID-19 second wave situation getting better: Minister
description: 'State government planning to get vaccines from international market cover as many people as possible' In 15 out of 36 districts in Maharashtra, the number of people getting discharged is much higher than patients getting admitted in hospital for COVID- 19, which is a “satisfactory and comforting indication”, state medical education minister Amit Deshmukh said here on Monday.

title: Thane Corona News: 4 COVID-19 patients die in Thane hospital, investigation ordered | Mumbai News - Times of India
description: Four COVID-19 patients died at Vedanta hospital in Thane in the early morning on Monday, officials said.

title: Covid-19: Mask, traffic violations shoot up in Maharashtra's Raigad in April
description: This is a huge rise from the 1,302 people who were penalised a cumulative sum of ₹4.72 lakh for mask violations in the district between March 1 last year and March 31, 2021, an official said.

title: Maharashtra with 11 crore people recorded 823 deaths in 24 hrs, UP with 23 crore saw 206 deaths: BJP slams MVA
description: BJP spokesperson Gaurav Bhatia attacked the MVA government as Maharashtra recorded over four times more deaths than UP in a day despite having less than half of its population.

title: COVID-19: People Gasping for Oxygen in Maharashtra Shows Lack of Planning by State, Central Govts | NewsClick
description: While the state government reportedly failed to raise a single oxygen plant in the last one year after the pandemic hit, the central government too failed to raise any oxygen plants, with installation of only two out of 10 approved supposed to begin from Saturday.

title: Aurangabad in Maharashtra records 1,081 Covid-19 cases, 27 deaths in a day

title: Covid-19: Maharashtra issues new restrictions amid rise in cases
description: The Covid-19 pandemic continued to hit Maximum City hard as the death toll was recorded at 75 individuals on Thursday. This is the highest loss of lives in 2021 for Mumbai due to the coronavirus. Amid rising Covid cases, Maharashtra has reissued passes for inter-state and inter-district travel.

title: Maharashtra: Covid-19 curbs may extend beyond 1 May, says health minister Tope

title: Maharashtra reports over 60,000 new Covid-19 cases, active caseload up by over 28,000
